events.title: QBraid Tutorial by Rick Young, COO of QBraid
events.description: Learning to use and navigate the QBraid platform where you will be running your code.

events.title: Kick-Off & Tutorials
events.description: Kick-Off, Tutorials, Level 0 Notebook is up; Team pairings happening; Dinner is happening

events.title: Keynote: Dr. Gushu Li
events.description: Guest Speaker: Dr. Gushu Li, Assistant Professor at the University of Pennsylvania

events.title: Work on Level 0 Notebook
events.description: Work on Level 0 Notebook, We provide feedback

events.title: Level 0 Submission & Level 1 Release
events.description: Submission for Level 0 Notebook due at 10:00pm; Level 1 Notebook is up. Team pairing for open challenges is happening

events.title: Challenges Open
events.description: Open challenges open; Teams stay paired as for Level 1; prizes are announced

events.title: Feedback Session
events.description: Feedback is open for Challenge contenders

events.title: Presentation of Open Challenges
events.description: Challenges progress due at 3:00pm. Teams present their open challenge solutions

events.title: Keynote: Dr. Phalgun Lolur
events.description: Guest Speaker: Dr. Phalgun Lolur, Global Scientific Quantum Development Lead, Capgemini's Quantum Lab

events.title: join ITrack Pitches
events.description: Winner Announcements, Certificates of Participates and Certificates of Achievement are distributed

events.title: Awards & Closing Ceremony
events.description: Winner Announcements, Certificates of Participates and Certificates of Achievement are distributed
